issue.title: [CI] Use clcache on AppVeyor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2231](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2231). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a ccache equivalent for Windows named clcache that could be used to speed up AppVeyor builds: https://github.com/frerich/clcache/

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2231?focusedCommentId=16381218) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1679
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1679>
